message.body: Hey, would you have any time to help me at the shop installing windows tomorrow or Friday?
I'm working at kurts tomorrow through Friday. I could do it Saturday
Hmmm ok. That could work. Probably only s half day. I got 4 out of 5 windows already in place, just need help leveling them, replacing a sill, repairing some exterior molding and fastening them in.
Btw I still have a lot of old door/window trim I would like to get off my wood rack. I'll use some at kurts but I would sell to u the rest for super cheap if you need casing
If you want to get rid of it you could store it at the shop but I have no need for it and am spending all my money and more trying to get the shop up and running.
Ok I'll hold onto it for now but if you get a job where you need the original trim replaced, keep in mind that I have it
You can have that router table if you want , but I'd set up a table saw with router mount if I were you
Yeah, I'm gonna get a 52" Sawstop and mount a rout R lift plate to it.
